tvshows.title: The Boys
tvshows.plot: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.
tvshows.actor: Karl Urban, Jack Quaid, Antony Starr

tvshows.title: Stranger Things
tvshows.plot: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.
tvshows.actor: Millie Bobby Brown, Finn Wolfhard, Winona Ryder

tvshows.title: Daredevil
tvshows.plot: A blind lawyer by day, vigilante by night. Matt Murdock fights the crime of New York as Daredevil.
tvshows.actor: Charlie Cox, Vincent D'Onofrio, Deborah Ann Woll

tvshows.title: WandaVision
tvshows.plot: Blends the style of classic sitcoms with the MCU in which Wanda Maximoff and Vision -two super-powered beings living their ideal suburban lives-begin to suspect that everything is not as it seems.
tvshows.actor: Elizabeth Olsen, Paul Bettany, Teyonah Parris
